user_question: How can I protect my smart refrigerator from cyber attacks?
final_answer: To protect your smart refrigerator from cyber attacks, ensure it is connected to a secure Wi-Fi network, regularly update its firmware, use strong and unique passwords, and consider setting up a separate network for IoT devices.
